name: Pathfinder - Level's 1&2
description:
Note: 

Some colliders on the black walls so please don't cheat by going through them

The Objective is to get to the portal to advance to the next maze/level. You also can collect 3 different types of pots that will give you 1, 5, or 10 coins. 

Green Eyes are mini portals that take you to a Blue Eyes (You can't go through Blue Eyes). Red Eyes are Enemy's that move and will kill you on contact. Orange Eyes are portals to Secret Rooms.

Use WASD to move through the maze.
